description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Get in the Holiday Spirit with some Holiday-themed trivia! Play as your Avatar with up to 3 other friends or family members and enjoy hundreds of Holiday-related questions while listening to wonderful Holiday music! Fun for all ages!
